      • apply

        public static <A> A apply(A obj,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<A> applyFunction)
        Run the given consumer on the given object, then return the original (potentially modified) object. Basically, a java implementation of Kotlin's apply extension function.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        obj - the obj
        applyFunction - the apply function
        Returns:
        the a
